nodes.bodyText: This was only here to support Normalize_AST.normalize, so we could undo the argument. 🤷

-let check2 ~hook rules equivs file lang ast =
+let check2 ~hook rules equivs file _lang ast =

nodes.bodyText: FWIW, I think basic_equivalences.yml already excludes Python from the rewrite. Do we still need the language check here?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -94,7 +94,13 @@ let regression_tests_for_lang files lang =
     let rule = { R.
       id = "unit testing"; pattern; message = ""; severity = R.Error; 
       languages = [lang] } in
-    let equiv = [] in
+    let equiv = 
+     (* Python == is not the same than !(==) *)
+     if lang <> Lang.Python

nodes.bodyText:
Oh, yeah, you're right! Actually I just realized the equivalence code does not respect the languages[] field
in the equivalence file ... I'll fix that in another diff.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -94,7 +94,13 @@ let regression_tests_for_lang files lang =
     let rule = { R.
       id = "unit testing"; pattern; message = ""; severity = R.Error; 
       languages = [lang] } in
-    let equiv = [] in
+    let equiv = 
+     (* Python == is not the same than !(==) *)
+     if lang <> Lang.Python
